name: TokenScript
introduce: TokenScript is a standard for token composability that makes it easier for businesses to create and use tokens. TokenScript improves functionality, security and usability of blockchain token in multiple ways. TokenScript allows token issuers and other trusted authorities to enrich a given token with a wide set of information, rules and functionalities. With TokenScript wallets and webservices can easily, securely and privately implement a token with all its functions, both onchain and offchain, without the need to understand the underlying smart contract.
